body_html:
I just want to make everyone aware that there is another issue with the nvidia ubuntu driver and 1080 Ti SLI.
I'm not sure if they could be related.

https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1000833/linux/unity-doesn-t-start-on-ubuntu-16-04-when-sli-on/post/5213941/#5213941

body:
I just want to make everyone aware that there is another issue with the nvidia ubuntu driver and 1080 Ti SLI.
I'm not sure if they could be related.

https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1000833/linux/unity-doesn-t-start-on-ubuntu-16-04-when-sli-on/post/5213941/#5213941
